summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 29th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to West Bertona Street; by constructing wateramins and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12059 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
